cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 15 miles WNW of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to move WNW across Hispaniola and Cuba, then turn northwest into the Gulf of Mexico toward the Louisiana–upper Texas Gulf Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Northern and southern coasts of the Dominican Republic, northern Haiti, SE Bahamas, Turks & Caicos, several Cuban provinces, Florida Keys and Florida Bay under Tropical Storm Watch
weather_observation.warning_coast: Parts of Dominican Republic, northern Haiti, SE Bahamas, Turks & Caicos, and eastern Cuban provinces under Tropical Storm Warning
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Greater Antilles today, Cuba Sunday–Monday, northern Gulf Coast (LA–TX) mid-week
weather_observation.wind: Only breezy conditions expected; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely at the port
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture could bring periods of moderate rain late next week, but significant flooding is not expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: Localized ponding on roadways possible if heavier showers reach NW Ohio, otherwise none
